N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7434.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) The State

Commission of Correction (the commission) recognizes the need to provide a
mechanism by which the Office of Children and Family Services (OCFS) may apply
for a variance to the requirements of this Chapter when situations exist or
arise that would prevent or alter OCFS's ability to meet such requirement. The
commission shall grant such variances only under specified conditions and when
doing so will not jeopardize the safety, security, or good order of a secure
facility. (b) Consistent with the
requirements of this Part, OCFS shall develop written policies and procedures
that govern the application process of obtaining variances for each secure
facility. These policies and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated
as needed. Notes
